selected_quotes: If you'd like a preview of 'An Introduction to Cyberpsychology', you can read the prelims and first chapter now at htt…
@myIADT book An Introduction to Cyberpsychology launched officially today - exciting! Chapters 616 are my babies!
Great to see UCD Psychology people have contributed to this with our colleagues @myIADT.
Excited to finally see our new book and to have my chapters in with all these great authors!
Delighted to attend the launch of our new textbook Intro to #Cyberpsychology
